author: markt
msg: Add build properties to enable tests to be executed against alternative binaries. Based on a patch by Petr Sumbera.

author: reschke
msg: OAK-2986: RDBDataSourceFactory: switch to tomcat datasource implementation (ported to 1.2)

author: rhuijben
msg: On the 1.3.x branch: merge r1702264 from trunk to allow scons arguments

author: rhuijben
msg: Stop handling every unknown argument to SCons as an error.
SCons supports quite a few arguments itself which it would be able to handle
This should eventually enable platforms such as FreeBSD to use their
default SCons build support. (Although we have more problems to fix first).
Just warn on unknown arguments instead of fail.
